featured.text: Depending on your pet’s mood, the picture will capture an interested, curious expression or possibly a look of annoyance, especially if you’ve awakened it from a nap.
Hanging around people who are positive and in good moods is another way to help you find your smile again.

definition.en_def: A temporary state of mind or feeling.
definition.example: She was in a cheerful mood after receiving good news.
